A couple of points: I do plan on forcing myself to finish my own set 
of 50 scenarios.

What I plan for bringing discussion to the floor is work on the '50 
project': start to work out a basic premise that will carry things 
through 15 scenarios at least and expand things from there.  By April, 
we may start over with a discussion of improvements for the game and 
take it a slow pace.
